results.name: Continued fraction for sqrt(1 - 1/sqrt(2)), the abscissa of the point of bisection of the arc of the unit lemniscate (x^2 + y^2)^2 = x^2 - y^2 in the first quadrant.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
xref: Cf. A154739, A154741 and A154742 for the decimal expansion and the numerators and denominators of the convergents.
results.author: _Stuart Clary_, Jan 14 2009
